title: WTB: Looking for Young Portrait EPDG or OM?  Speaker Tolstoi, Sov or Amer Beauty?
author: bounce

posts.post_title: WTB: Looking for Young Portrait EPDG or OM?  Speaker Tolstoi, Sov or Amer Beauty?
posts.post_content:
Looking for nice mid-grade examples of:

Cy Young Portrait - Any EPDG or Old Mill

Tris Speaker - Tolstoi, Sovereign or American Beauty. Might even look at a Polar Bear; would certainly consider any other tough backs but focused on these for now

I'm happy to pay market price, not looking for deals/steals - want these for my back run PCs of each.

Hoping to If you've got something available, let me know.

PM or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url]

Thanks in advance

Bumping this back up, saw a couple but have not acquired one yet.

Let me know
Trying this again - missed on a Young EPDG recently and kicking myself for it...
